#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		string p;
		cin>>p;
		if(p.length()<=100)
		{
		
		for(i=0;i<p.length();i++)
		{
			if(p[i]=='A'||p[i]=='D'||p[i]=='O'||p[i]=='P'||p[i]=='Q'||p[i]=='R')
			count++;
			else if(p[i]=='B')
			count+=2;
				else 
				continue;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
}
	return 0;
}
